description: Fols. 16; 21.6 x 15.9 cm.; written surface 17.7 x 9 cm.; 27 lines to page; on glazed European paper; in naskhi; with catchwords; entries in red. A treatise discussing the doctrine of the unity of God. Beg.: بسم الله ... وبعد فهذا کتاب جم الفوائد بدىع الفرائد Colophon: والله الموفق بمنه وکرمه والحمد لله وحده وصلى الله على من لا نبي بعده واله وصحبه ووارثىه وحزبه MS in good condition; Arabic binding. Probably from the XVIIth century. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900. Catalogue des manuscrits arabes de la Bibliothèque Nationale, 4657¹².
author: Maqrīzī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1364-1442
creator: Maqrīzī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1364-1442
subject: Islam—Doctrines—Early works to 1800
